item.title: mighty neuse
item.description:
mighty neuse

There's something special about a 6am sunrise regatta on the Neuse River in Arapahoe, NC. I wish this photo had a sound bite. Sheets flapping, waves crashing, bugles blowing, sea gulls calling. Pretty surreal moment.

telluride, co

item.title: The 50 Best Albums of 2015 by Paste Magazine
item.description:
The 50 Best Albums of 2015 by Paste Magazine

2015 saw some highly anticipated returns by some of our favorite artists—Sleater-Kinney, Wilco, Kendrick Lamar, Father John Misty, Sufjan Stevens—but what perhaps what was most notable about this year in music was the amount of remarkable debut albums from new artists. Leon Bridges, Tobias Jesso Jr, Beach Slang, Palehound and Natalie Prass all wowed us with their very first full-length efforts—a reason to celebrate this year’s work but also look ahead to the great music that they might produce in 2016 and beyond. For this year’s list, we polled editors, writers and interns and wound up with votes for over 200 albums. Whittling that down to 50 was no easy task, but without further ado, we present the Best Albums of 2015.

item.title: olin, nc
item.description:
olin, nc

I've never even heard of the podunk western NC town, Olin. I was driving through on my way to Roaring Gap and pulled over to witness gold as far as the eye could see.

item.title: green river narrows
item.description:
green river narrows

This regular flow allows for year-round kayaking in Flat Rock, NC and is part of the reason the Green is such a notorious and well-known river.

item.title: SpaceX captured the Falcon 9 rocket's launch and landing in one photo
item.description:
SpaceX captured the Falcon 9 rocket's launch and landing in one photo

SpaceX just launched a rocket to space and safely landed the first stage, in case you hadn't heard. The historic feat marks a huge shift in the private space industry, as the idea of a reusable rocket is now on the table.
